author: scottbw
msg: Fixed an issue with the Widgets controller using a legacy "getLocalPath" method to prepend to icon URLs rather than the newer method that lets configuration properties (e.g. for virtual hosts) override the default request scheme/host/port. Thanks to Jasha for spotting this one.
